metadata.title: AI-Enhanced ML-FAANG Mastery Plan
metadata.description: 20-week comprehensive roadmap for ML researchers transitioning to FAANG software engineering roles with AI-powered learning assistance

week.title: Advanced Algorithms + Comprehensive Pattern Mastery
objectives: Achieve mastery of contest-level algorithms with 35+ problems
Integrate DSA skills with system design principles for production-level thinking
Optimize solutions for production constraints (memory, CPU, hardware)
Build a FAANG-ready algorithm interview simulator project

morning_session.title: Advanced Algorithm Design
activities: Advanced algorithm design principles with AI guidance on optimization strategies
AI explanation connecting algorithm optimization to ML model efficiency and inference speed
Complexity analysis beyond Big-O with AI insights into practical performance

problems.name: Meeting Rooms II
problems.description: AI coaching on interval scheduling optimization
problems.ai_prompt: Compare the priority queue (min-heap) solution with the sorting-based approach. What are the trade-offs in a real-time scheduling system?

problems.name: Maximum Frequency Stack
problems.description: Connect to data structure design in ML pipelines
problems.ai_prompt: Explain the dual hash map design. How does the 'stack of stacks' concept ensure O(1) push and pop operations? Relate this to managing model versions or experiment results.

problems.name: Design Twitter
problems.description: AI guidance on system design through coding
problems.ai_prompt: How would you scale the `getNewsFeed` operation? Discuss the trade-offs of merging k-sorted lists from user's followees. Compare a heap-based merge with a simpler iterative merge.

evening_session.title: Optimized Data Structures & Prod ML
activities: Implement AI-optimized data structures with production-level performance analysis
ML System Study: Cross-company analysis of algorithm choices in production
Plan advanced optimization techniques with AI strategic guidance

morning_session.title: Contest-Level Problems
activities: Contest strategy and time management with AI optimization for problem selection
AI analysis of competitive programming patterns and advanced optimization techniques
Mathematical problem-solving approaches with AI-guided proof techniques

problems.name: Shortest Path in Binary Matrix
problems.description: A* algorithm with AI optimization
problems.ai_prompt: While BFS works, how could you apply the A* algorithm here? What would be a suitable heuristic? Discuss the benefits in a larger grid.

problems.name: Word Search II
problems.description: Trie + DFS optimization with AI complexity analysis
problems.ai_prompt: Explain how using a Trie and backtracking on the board prunes the search space significantly compared to iterating through each word.

problems.name: Regular Expression Matching
problems.description: AI step-by-step DP approach
problems.ai_prompt: Define the 2D DP state `dp[i][j]`. Explain the logic for the base cases and the transitions, especially for the '*' character.

problems.name: Count Good Nodes in Binary Tree
problems.description: Count nodes with no larger ancestors
problems.ai_prompt: How does path-dependent counting relate to sequential decision making?

problems.name: Construct Binary Tree from Preorder and Inorder Traversal
problems.description: Reconstruct tree from traversals
problems.ai_prompt: How does tree reconstruction relate to model architecture search?

problems.name: Implement Trie (Prefix Tree)
problems.description: Implement prefix tree data structure
problems.ai_prompt: How does trie implementation relate to tokenization in NLP?

evening_session.title: Live Contest & Analysis
activities: Codeforces Round participation with AI real-time strategy coaching
AI analysis of contest performance and advanced problem-solving patterns
Advanced SQL: Complex optimization queries and performance tuning

morning_session.title: System Design via Algorithms
activities: Algorithm choices in large-scale system design with AI trade-off analysis
AI explanation of algorithm scalability and distributed system considerations
Performance optimization in multi-threaded and distributed environments

problems.name: LRU Cache
problems.description: AI coaching on production-level implementation
problems.ai_prompt: Explain the combination of a doubly linked list and a hash map to achieve O(1) for get and put operations. How would you make this thread-safe?

problems.name: Design Hit Counter
problems.description: Connect to real-time analytics in ML systems
problems.ai_prompt: Compare the solution using a queue with one using a fixed-size array and timestamps. Discuss the trade-offs for memory and accuracy in a high-throughput system.

problems.name: Insert Delete GetRandom O(1)
problems.description: AI optimization for constant time operations
problems.ai_prompt: Explain how using a hash map and a dynamic array (list) together allows for O(1) average time complexity for all three operations. Why is the swap-with-last-element trick crucial for deletion?

problems.name: Merge k Sorted Lists
problems.description: Merge multiple sorted linked lists efficiently
problems.ai_prompt: How does k-way merging relate to distributed data processing in ML?

problems.name: Design Add and Search Words Data Structure
problems.description: Trie with wildcard search functionality
problems.ai_prompt: How does wildcard search relate to fuzzy matching in ML applications?

problems.name: Kth Largest Element in a Stream
problems.description: Maintain kth largest in streaming data
problems.ai_prompt: How does streaming kth largest relate to online learning algorithms?

problems.name: Last Stone Weight
problems.description: Heap-based simulation problem
problems.ai_prompt: How does priority-based processing relate to task scheduling in ML pipelines?

problems.name: K Closest Points to Origin
problems.description: Find k closest points using heap
problems.ai_prompt: How does k-nearest selection relate to KNN algorithms in ML?

problems.name: Kth Largest Element in an Array
problems.description: Find kth largest using quickselect or heap
problems.ai_prompt: How does selection algorithms relate to feature selection in ML?

evening_session.title: FAANG Algo Design & Study
activities: Design algorithms for specific FAANG ML use cases with AI guidance
ML Study: Algorithm choices in TensorFlow, PyTorch production deployments
Plan comprehensive pattern review with AI assessment methodology

morning_session.title: Production Optimization
activities: Production algorithm optimization with AI analysis of memory and CPU constraints
AI explanation of algorithm adaptation for different hardware (GPU, TPU, mobile)
Profiling and benchmarking techniques with AI-guided performance analysis

problems.name: Median of Two Sorted Arrays
problems.description: AI coaching on logarithmic optimization
problems.ai_prompt: Revisit this problem. Explain the binary search approach on the partitions of the smaller array. What is the invariant you are trying to maintain?

problems.name: Longest Substring with At Most K Distinct Characters
problems.description: Advanced sliding window with AI complexity proof
problems.ai_prompt: Explain the sliding window approach with hash map to track character frequencies. How do you efficiently maintain at most k distinct characters?

problems.name: Burst Balloons
problems.description: AI step-by-step interval DP optimization
problems.ai_prompt: This is a classic interval DP problem. Explain why you need to decide which balloon to burst *last* in a given interval. Define the DP state and recurrence.

problems.name: Task Scheduler
problems.description: Schedule tasks with cooldown constraints
problems.ai_prompt: How does task scheduling relate to resource allocation in distributed ML training?

evening_session.title: FAANG Mock & Open Source Study
activities: AI Mock Interview: FAANG-level hard problems with optimization requirements
Study algorithm implementation in open-source ML frameworks
Plan comprehensive Phase 2 assessment with AI evaluation criteria

morning_session.title: Pattern Mastery Validation
activities: AI comprehensive review of all advanced patterns and optimization techniques
Contest-level problem identification and solution strategy with AI guidance
Final optimization techniques and code quality standards with AI assessment

coding_session.title: Contest & Excellence Challenge
activities: Google Kick Start or AtCoder Contest with AI real-time coaching
AI-Supervised Excellence Challenge: Contest-hard problems (5 in 30 minutes)
AI comprehensive performance analysis and pattern mastery verification

evening_session.title: Final Assessment & Planning
activities: AI assessment of overall algorithmic maturity and interview readiness
Plan Phase 3 transition with focus on ML system design and advanced topics
Comprehensive review of achievements and areas for continued optimization

saturday.title: Portfolio Project: FAANG-Level Algorithm Interview Simulator
saturday.description: Build a comprehensive interview preparation platform that simulates real FAANG coding interviews with company-specific problem sets, AI-powered feedback, and adaptive difficulty scaling. The system will prepare candidates for the highest level technical interviews.

problems.name: Text Justification
problems.description: Complex string formatting with greedy algorithms

problems.name: Wildcard Matching
problems.description: Advanced DP for pattern matching

problems.name: Word Ladder II
problems.description: BFS with path reconstruction

tasks: Create company-specific problem sets with Google, Meta, Amazon, Apple, and Microsoft patterns.
Implement AI-powered code analysis for time/space complexity and optimization suggestions.
Build adaptive difficulty system that adjusts based on candidate performance and target company.
Design real-time interview simulation with behavioral questions and system design integration.
saturday.deliverable: A deployed interview platform with comprehensive problem sets, AI feedback system, and performance analytics dashboard.

sunday.title: Phase 2 Assessment & Advanced ML System Architecture Study
sunday.description: Complete comprehensive Phase 2 evaluation through multi-hour FAANG simulation interviews, followed by deep dive into advanced ML system architectures across major tech companies to prepare for Phase 3.

problems.name: Critical Connections in a Network
problems.description: Tarjan's algorithm for finding bridges in graphs

problems.name: Regular Expression Matching
problems.description: Advanced dynamic programming with string matching

tasks: Complete 3-hour FAANG simulation covering hard algorithm problems and system design.
Receive comprehensive AI performance analysis across all Phase 2 patterns and skills.
Study advanced ML architectures: Google's TPU systems, Meta's PyTorch infrastructure, Amazon's SageMaker.
Design strategic learning plan for Phase 3 ML system design focus with personalized recommendations.
sunday.deliverable: Complete Phase 2 assessment report with performance analysis and strategic Phase 3 preparation plan.
